text: @DanCrenshawTX You ready to sacrifice your mother or your grandma for someone’s right to go spread their COVID19 at her supermarket bc they refuse to cover their infected pie hole? People don’t have the right to spread HIV. They shouldn’t have the right to spread COVID19.
